hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(html|xhtml|htm)$'; then (echo '=== html-validate ===' ; npx html-validate "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== htmlhint ===' ; npx htmlhint "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== pa11y (WCAG2AA) ===' ; npx pa11y "$file_path" 2>&1) | node scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=html ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.css$'; then (echo '=== stylelint ===' ; npx stylelint "$file_path" 2>&1) | node scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=css ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.js$'; then (echo '=== eslint ===' ; npx eslint "$file_path" 2>&1) | node scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=js ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.md$' && ! echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '(\.worklog|node_modules)/'; then (echo '=== markdownlint ===' ; npx markdownlint "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== cspell ===' ; npx cspell "$file_path" --no-progress 2>&1) | node scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=md ; fi
